text: Mönchberg is a market community in the Miltenberg district in the Lower Franconia region in Bavaria, Germany. It is the seat of the Administrative Community of Mönchberg and a state-recognized climatic spa (Luftkurort). == Geography == === Place === Mönchberg is in the Bavarian part of the Spessart (range), 13 km from the district seat of Miltenberg, 30 km from Aschaffenburg, 69 km from Frankfurt am Main and 76 km from Würzburg. === Neighbouring communities === Mönchberg borders in the west on Klingenberg and Erlenbach (with the outlying centres of Mechenhard and Streit), in the north on Elsenfeld and Eschau, in the east on Collenberg (on the Main) and in the south on Röllbach. === Subdivisions=== The outlying centre, or Ortsteil, of Schmachtenberg, was combined in 1978. == References == == Other websites == * Mönchberg official webpage * Ortsteil of Schmachtenberg Category:Miltenberg (district)
title: Mönchberg
